metadata.title: CVE-2019-20041 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: wp_kses_bad_protocol in wp-includes/kses.php in WordPress before 5.3.1mishandles the HTML5 colon named entity, allowing attackers to bypass inputsanitization, as demonstrated by the javascript: substring.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
